thread.title: No. 7 LSU too much for displaced South Carolina, 45-24

title: No. 7 LSU too much for displaced South Carolina, 45-24
text:
> South Carolina No. 7 LSU too much for displaced South Carolina, 45-24 LSU running back Leonard Fournette (7) stiff arms South Carolina linebacker Skai Moore (10) during the first half of an NCAA college football game in Baton Rouge, La., Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015. (AP Photo/Jonathan Bachman)
